description.en: One of the most prestigious distilleries in the world, known for exceptional sherry-matured whiskies.
description.zh: 世界上最负盛名的酒厂之一，以卓越的雪莉桶陈年威士忌而闻名。

description.en: The world's best-selling single malt whisky, family-owned since 1886.
description.zh: 世界上最畅销的单一麦芽威士忌，自1886年以来一直由家族拥有。

description.en: The definitive Speyside malt, known for its smooth, fruity character.
description.zh: 斯佩塞的标志性麦芽，以其顺滑、果香的特点而闻名。

description.en: One of the few distilleries maintaining traditional floor maltings.
description.zh: 少数保持传统地板发芽的酒厂之一。

description.en: Known for rich, sherried expressions and double cask maturation.
description.zh: 以丰富的雪莉桶威士忌和双桶陈年而闻名。

description.en: Family-owned for six generations, famous for sherry cask whiskies.
description.zh: 家族拥有六代，以雪莉桶威士忌而闻名。

description.en: The sherry cask specialist, renowned for rich, deeply sherried whiskies.
description.zh: 雪莉桶专家，以浓郁、深度雪莉桶威士忌而闻名。

description.en: Known for innovative cask finishes and both peated and unpeated styles.
description.zh: 以创新的桶陈和泥煤、无泥煤风格而闻名。

description.en: The Beast of Dufftown, famous for its meaty, complex character.
description.zh: 达夫镇之兽，以其肉质、复杂的特性而闻名。

description.en: One of the Classic Malts, known for its complex, aromatic character.
description.zh: 经典麦芽之一，以其复杂、芳香的特性而闻名。

description.en: The oldest operating distillery in the Highlands, home of Chivas Regal.
description.zh: 高地最古老的运营酒厂，芝华士的故乡。

description.en: One of the world's best-selling single malts, known for its light, fruity style.
description.zh: 世界上最畅销的单一麦芽之一，以其轻盈、果香的风格而闻名。

description.en: A distiller's favorite, producing rich, complex whisky often used in blends.
description.zh: 蒸馏师的最爱，生产丰富、复杂的威士忌，常用于调和。

description.en: One of Speyside's smallest distilleries, producing hand-crafted whisky.
description.zh: 斯佩塞最小的酒厂之一，生产手工威士忌。

description.en: The gentle dram, known for soft, accessible whiskies.
description.zh: 温柔的威士忌，以柔和、易饮的特性而闻名。

description.en: 100% sherry cask matured whisky with traditional Saladin maltings.
description.zh: 100%雪莉桶陈年威士忌，保留传统萨拉丁发芽。

description.en: The bad boy of Speyside, known for its sulfury, meaty character.
description.zh: 斯佩塞的坏小子，以其硫磺、肉质特性而闻名。

description.en: Affordable Speyside whisky with excellent quality-to-value ratio.
description.zh: 价格实惠的斯佩塞威士忌，性价比极高。

description.en: The golden heart of Johnnie Walker, founded by Helen Cumming.
description.zh: 尊尼获加的黄金心脏，由海伦·卡明创立。

description.en: Known for vintage-dated releases showcasing each year's character.
description.zh: 以年份标注发布而闻名，展示每年的特性。

description.en: Famous for its tall stills - the tallest in Scotland - producing elegant whisky.
description.zh: 以其高塔蒸馏器而闻名——苏格兰最高的——生产优雅的威士忌。

description.en: Known for exceptional sherry cask maturation and the iconic stag emblem.
description.zh: 以卓越的雪莉桶陈年和标志性的雄鹿徽章而闻名。

description.en: One of Scotland's oldest distilleries, bridging Highland and Island styles.
description.zh: 苏格兰最古老的酒厂之一，连接高地和岛屿风格。

description.en: One of Scotland's oldest distilleries, producing rich Highland malts in Aberdeenshire.
description.zh: 苏格兰最古老的酒厂之一，在阿伯丁郡生产丰富的高地麦芽。

description.en: Known for its distinctive waxy, coastal character from the Northern Highlands.
description.zh: 以其独特的蜡质、海岸特性而闻名，来自北部高地。

description.en: Scotland's highest distillery at 1,164 feet, producing gentle Highland malt.
description.zh: 苏格兰最高的酒厂，海拔1164英尺，生产温和的高地麦芽。

description.en: One of Scotland's oldest working distilleries, the home of Bell's blended whisky.
description.zh: 苏格兰最古老的运营酒厂之一，贝尔调和威士忌的故乡。

description.en: Scotland's smallest traditional distillery, hand-crafting whisky in tiny batches.
description.zh: 苏格兰最小的传统酒厂，手工制作小批量威士忌。

description.en: Named after Britain's highest mountain, owned by Japanese Nikka.
description.zh: 以英国最高山命名，由日本Nikka拥有。

description.en: Producing whisky without peat since 1833, using sherry casks exclusively.
description.zh: 自1833年以来生产无泥煤威士忌，专门使用雪莉桶。

description.en: A converted cotton mill producing organic Highland whisky.
description.zh: 改建的棉纺厂，生产有机高地威士忌。

description.en: The maritime malt from Wick, Scotland's most northerly mainland town.
description.zh: 来自威克的海洋麦芽，苏格兰大陆最北的城镇。

description.en: One of Scotland's oldest distilleries, known for vintage releases.
description.zh: 苏格兰最古老的酒厂之一，以年份发布而闻名。

description.en: Once Scotland's largest distillery, now Japanese-owned.
description.zh: 曾经是苏格兰最大的酒厂，现在由日本人拥有。

description.en: The first whisky to be granted a Royal Warrant by King William IV.
description.zh: 第一个获得威廉四世国王皇家认证的威士忌。

description.en: The only remaining distillery on the Black Isle, with its own maltings.
description.zh: 黑岛上唯一剩余的酒厂，拥有自己的麦芽厂。

description.en: Highland's peated distillery, the heart of Teacher's blended whisky.
description.zh: 高地的泥煤酒厂，帝师调和威士忌的核心。

description.en: The Golden Dram, heart of Dewar's blended Scotch whisky.
description.zh: 黄金威士忌，帝王调和苏格兰威士忌的核心。

description.en: Scotland's oldest working distillery, home of The Famous Grouse.
description.zh: 苏格兰最古老的运营酒厂，著名松鸡的故乡。

description.en: Uses unique copper cooling system creating tropical fruit notes.
description.zh: 使用独特的铜冷却系统创造热带水果味。

description.en: Produces intensely peaty, complex whiskies beloved by peat enthusiasts.
description.zh: 生产浓郁泥煤、复杂的威士忌，深受泥煤爱好者喜爱。

description.en: Known for its distinctive medicinal, peaty character with maritime notes.
description.zh: 以其独特的药草、泥煤特性和海洋风味而闻名。

description.en: Produces some of the peatiest whiskies in Scotland with cult following.
description.zh: 生产苏格兰最泥煤的威士忌之一，拥有狂热追随者。

description.en: Islay's largest distillery, producing smoky yet elegant whiskies.
description.zh: 艾雷岛最大的酒厂，生产烟熏但优雅的威士忌。

description.en: One of the oldest Islay distilleries, known for balanced peated whiskies.
description.zh: 艾雷岛最古老的酒厂之一，以平衡的泥煤威士忌而闻名。

description.en: Progressive Hebridean distillery known for innovation and terroir.
description.zh: 进步的赫布里底酒厂，以创新和风土而闻名。

description.en: The gentlest of Islay malts, known for unpeated and lightly peated styles.
description.zh: 艾雷岛最温和的麦芽，以无泥煤和轻度泥煤风格而闻名。

description.en: Islay's farm distillery, growing their own barley and malting on-site.
description.zh: 艾雷岛的农场酒厂，种植自己的大麦并现场麦芽。

description.en: Islay's newest distillery, built with traditional methods and stunning views.
description.zh: 艾雷岛最新的酒厂，采用传统方法建造，景色壮观。

description.en: Orkney's finest, known for its perfect balance of smoke and sweetness.
description.zh: 奥克尼的最佳威士忌，以烟熏和甜味的完美平衡而闻名。

description.en: The only distillery on Skye, known for its powerful maritime character.
description.zh: 斯凯岛上唯一的酒厂，以其强大的海洋特性而闻名。

description.en: The only distillery on Jura, producing both unpeated and peated styles.
description.zh: 朱拉岛上唯一的酒厂，生产无泥煤和泥煤风格。

description.en: Mull's only distillery, producing both unpeated Tobermory and peated Ledaig.
description.zh: 马尔岛唯一的酒厂，生产无泥煤的Tobermory和泥煤的Ledaig。

description.en: The first legal distillery on Arran in 150 years, producing unpeated whisky.
description.zh: 150年来阿伦岛上的第一家合法酒厂，生产无泥煤威士忌。

description.en: Orkney's other distillery, producing smooth, honey-noted whisky.
description.zh: 奥克尼的另一家酒厂，生产顺滑、蜂蜜味的威士忌。

description.en: The only distillery in Scotland to carry out 100% of production on-site.
description.zh: 苏格兰唯一在现场完成100%生产的酒厂。

description.en: One of only three remaining Campbeltown distilleries with briny character.
description.zh: 仅存的三家坎贝尔镇酒厂之一，具有咸味特性。

description.en: Revived Campbeltown distillery producing Kilkerran single malt.
description.zh: 复兴的坎贝尔镇酒厂，生产奇克伦单一麦芽。

description.en: Scotland's only distillery to triple distill every drop.
description.zh: 苏格兰唯一对每一滴都进行三次蒸馏的酒厂。

description.en: The Edinburgh Malt, known for light, floral character.
description.zh: 爱丁堡麦芽，以轻盈、花香特性而闻名。

description.en: Scotland's most southerly distillery, revived and producing again.
description.zh: 苏格兰最南端的酒厂，已复兴并再次生产。

description.en: Modern Lowland distillery experimenting with peated styles.
description.zh: 现代低地酒厂，尝试泥煤风格。

description.en: Ireland's largest distillery, producing Jameson, Redbreast, and more.
description.zh: 爱尔兰最大的酒厂，生产尊美醇、Redbreast等。

description.en: The world's oldest licensed whiskey distillery.
description.zh: 世界上最古老的持牌威士忌酒厂。

description.en: Dublin's first new distillery in over 125 years.
description.zh: 125年来都柏林第一家新酒厂。

description.en: Japan's first whisky distillery, founded by Shinjiro Torii.
description.zh: 日本第一家威士忌酒厂，由鸟井信治郎创立。

description.en: Suntory's forest distillery, known for fresh, herbal whiskies.
description.zh: 三得利的森林酒厂，以清新、草本威士忌而闻名。

description.en: Founded by Masataka Taketsuru, the father of Japanese whisky.
description.zh: 由日本威士忌之父竹鹤政孝创立。

description.en: Nikka's second distillery, known for elegant, fruity character.
description.zh: Nikka的第二家酒厂，以优雅、果香特性而闻名。

description.en: Small Japanese distillery founded by Ichiro Akuto, highly sought after.
description.zh: 由肥土伊知郎创立的小型日本酒厂，备受追捧。

description.en: One of America's oldest continuously operating distilleries.
description.zh: 美国最古老的连续运营酒厂之一。

description.en: Famous for its red wax seal and wheated bourbon recipe.
description.zh: 以其红蜡封和小麦波本配方而闻名。

description.en: One of Kentucky's oldest and smallest distilleries.
description.zh: 肯塔基州最古老和最小的酒厂之一。

description.en: Known for bold, flavorful bourbon bottled at higher proofs.
description.zh: 以高酒精度装瓶的大胆、风味浓郁的波本而闻名。

description.en: Uses 10 distinct bourbon recipes for its range.
description.zh: 使用10种不同的波本配方。

description.en: America's largest family-owned distillery.
description.zh: 美国最大的家族拥有酒厂。

description.en: The world's best-selling bourbon, family-crafted for over 200 years.
description.zh: 世界上最畅销的波本，家族制作超过200年。

description.en: The most sought-after bourbon in the world, produced at Buffalo Trace.
description.zh: 世界上最受追捧的波本，在水牛足迹生产。

description.en: Wheated bourbon sharing DNA with Pappy Van Winkle.
description.zh: 小麦波本与帕皮范温克尔共享DNA。

description.en: Single barrel bourbon aged 10 years, from Buffalo Trace.
description.zh: 单桶波本陈年10年，来自水牛足迹。

description.en: America's best-selling whiskey, made with charcoal mellowing.
description.zh: 美国最畅销的威士忌，采用木炭过滤工艺。

description.en: Tennessee's other famous whisky, known for its smoothness.
description.zh: 田纳西州的另一款著名威士忌，以其顺滑而闻名。

description.en: Canada's best-selling whisky, known for smoothness.
description.zh: 加拿大最畅销的威士忌，以顺滑而闻名。

description.en: Reviving traditional 100% rye Canadian whisky.
description.zh: 复兴传统的100%黑麦加拿大威士忌。

description.en: Taiwan's pioneering distillery, multiple World Whisky Award winner.
description.zh: 台湾开创性的酒厂，多次获得世界威士忌奖。

description.en: India's first single malt producer, based in Bangalore.
description.zh: 印度第一家单一麦芽生产商，总部位于班加罗尔。

description.en: Indian single malt from Goa's coastal climate.
description.zh: 来自果阿沿海气候的印度单一麦芽。

description.en: Australia's most awarded distillery.
description.zh: 澳大利亚获奖最多的酒厂。

description.en: Melbourne distillery using Australian wine barrels.
description.zh: 墨尔本酒厂使用澳大利亚葡萄酒桶。

description.en: Wales' first distillery in over a century.
description.zh: 一个多世纪以来威尔士的第一家酒厂。

description.en: England's first whisky distillery in over 100 years.
description.zh: 100多年来英格兰的第一家威士忌酒厂。

description.en: Award-winning English whisky using local barley.
description.zh: 使用当地大麦的获奖英格兰威士忌。

description.en: Whisky maker in England's stunning Lake District.
description.zh: 在英格兰美丽的湖区制作威士忌。

description.en: Sweden's whisky pioneer using Swedish oak.
description.zh: 瑞典威士忌先驱，使用瑞典橡木。

description.en: Danish distillery using traditional floor malting.
description.zh: 使用传统地板发芽的丹麦酒厂。

description.en: Dutch family distillery, home of Millstone.
description.zh: 荷兰家族酒厂，Millstone的故乡。

description.en: Bavarian distillery using Alpine water.
description.zh: 使用阿尔卑斯水的巴伐利亚酒厂。

description.en: Germany's largest malt whisky distillery.
description.zh: 德国最大的麦芽威士忌酒厂。

description.en: Finnish distillery famous for rye spirits.
description.zh: 以黑麦烈酒而闻名的芬兰酒厂。

description.en: Finnish whisky from a brewery-distillery.
description.zh: 来自啤酒厂-酒厂的芬兰威士忌。

description.en: Belgium's pioneering single malt distillery.
description.zh: 比利时开创性的单一麦芽酒厂。

description.en: Belgian whisky from renowned beer makers.
description.zh: 来自著名啤酒制造商的比利时威士忌。

description.en: Swiss distillery known for wine cask finishes.
description.zh: 以葡萄酒桶陈年而闻名的瑞士酒厂。

description.en: France's oldest whisky producer, home of Armorik.
description.zh: 法国最古老的威士忌生产商，Armorik的故乡。

description.en: Craft Breton whisky using direct-fire distillation.
description.zh: 使用直火蒸馏的手工布列塔尼威士忌。

description.en: New Zealand whisky using native Manuka wood.
description.zh: 使用本地麦卢卡木的新西兰威士忌。

description.en: South Africa's only whisky distillery.
description.zh: 南非唯一的威士忌酒厂。

description.en: Israel's first whisky distillery.
description.zh: 以色列第一家威士忌酒厂。

description.en: Spain's historic whisky producer.
description.zh: 西班牙历史悠久的威士忌生产商。

description.en: Italy's first whisky distillery in the Alps.
description.zh: 意大利在阿尔卑斯山的第一家威士忌酒厂。

description.en: Producer of legendary Czech Hammer Head whisky.
description.zh: 传奇捷克锤头威士忌的生产商。

description.en: Austrian master distiller of fruit and whisky.
description.zh: 奥地利水果和威士忌大师蒸馏师。

description.en: Austrian distillery experimenting with grains.
description.zh: 尝试谷物的奥地利酒厂。

description.en: Singapore's largest distillery and first whiskey producer. Creates Singapore's first rice whiskey from Thai Hom Mali rice, collaborating with renowned Japanese whisky expert Kenji Hariu.
description.zh: 新加坡最大的酒厂和第一家威士忌生产商。使用泰国茉莉香米创造新加坡第一款米威士忌，与日本威士忌专家针生健二合作。

description.en: Producer of Hidden Hills Single Malt Whisky and craft spirits, pioneering distillation in Singapore.
description.zh: Hidden Hills单一麦芽威士忌和手工烈酒生产商，开创新加坡蒸馏业先河。

description.en: Craft distillery focusing on gin and innovative spirits production in Singapore.
description.zh: 专注于杜松子酒和创新烈酒生产的手工酒厂。
